verses.text: Ye \add are\add* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: ye shall not \w cut|strong="H1413"\w* yourselves, nor \w make|strong="H7760"\w* any \w baldness|strong="H7144"\w* between your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* for the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*.

For thou \add art\add* an \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* thee to be a \w peculiar|strong="H5459"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* unto himself, above all the \w nations|strong="H5971"\w* that \add are\add* \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*.
¶ Thou shalt not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* any abominable \w thing|strong="H8441"\w*.
These \add are\add* the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* which ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*: the \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, the \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*, and the \w goat|strong="H5795"\w*,

The \w hart|strong="H0354"\w*, and the \w roebuck|strong="H6643"\w*, and the fallow \w deer|strong="H3180"\w*, and the wild \w goat|strong="H0689"\w*, and the \w pygarg|strong="H1788"\w*, and the wild \w ox|strong="H8377"\w*, and the \w chamois|strong="H2169"\w*.\f + \fr 14.5 \ft pygarg: or bison: Heb. dishon\f*

And every \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* that \w parteth|strong="H6536"\w* the \w hoof|strong="H6541"\w*, and \w cleaveth|strong="H8157"\w* the \w cleft|strong="H8156"\w* into \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w claws|strong="H6541"\w*, \add and\add* \w cheweth|strong="H5927"\w* the \w cud|strong="H1625"\w* among the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*, that ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.

Nevertheless these ye shall not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of them that \w chew|strong="H5927"\w* the \w cud|strong="H1625"\w*, or of them that \w divide|strong="H6536"\w* the \w cloven|strong="H8156"\w* \w hoof|strong="H6541"\w*; \add as\add* the \w camel|strong="H1581"\w*, and the \w hare|strong="H0768"\w*, and the \w coney|strong="H8227"\w*: for they \w chew|strong="H5927"\w* the \w cud|strong="H1625"\w*, but \w divide|strong="H6536"\w* not the \w hoof|strong="H6541"\w*; \add therefore\add* they \add are\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* unto you.

And the \w swine|strong="H2386"\w*, because it \w divideth|strong="H6536"\w* the \w hoof|strong="H6541"\w*, yet cheweth not the \w cud|strong="H1625"\w*, it \add is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* unto you: ye shall not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of their \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, nor \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* their dead \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w*.

¶ These ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of all that \add are\add* in the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*: all that have \w fins|strong="H5579"\w* and \w scales|strong="H7193"\w* shall ye \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*:
And whatsoever hath not \w fins|strong="H5579"\w* and \w scales|strong="H7193"\w* ye may not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*; it \add is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* unto you.
¶ \add Of\add* all \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w birds|strong="H6833"\w* ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.
But these \add are they\add* of which ye shall not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*: the \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w*, and the \w ossifrage|strong="H6538"\w*, and the \w ospray|strong="H5822"\w*,
And the \w glede|strong="H7201"\w*, and the \w kite|strong="H0344"\w*, and the \w vulture|strong="H1772"\w* after his \w kind|strong="H4327"\w*,
And every \w raven|strong="H6158"\w* after his \w kind|strong="H4327"\w*,
And the \w owl|strong="H1323"\w*, and the night \w hawk|strong="H8464"\w*, and the \w cuckow|strong="H7828"\w*, and the \w hawk|strong="H5322"\w* after his \w kind|strong="H4327"\w*,
The little \w owl|strong="H3563"\w*, and the great \w owl|strong="H3244"\w*, and the \w swan|strong="H8580"\w*,
And the \w pelican|strong="H6893"\w*, and the gier \w eagle|strong="H7360"\w*, and the \w cormorant|strong="H7994"\w*,
And the \w stork|strong="H2624"\w*, and the \w heron|strong="H0601"\w* after her \w kind|strong="H4327"\w*, and the \w lapwing|strong="H1744"\w*, and the \w bat|strong="H5847"\w*.
And every creeping \w thing|strong="H8318"\w* that \w flieth|strong="H5775"\w* \add is\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* unto you: they shall not be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*.
\add But of\add* all \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* ye may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.

¶ Ye shall not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add of\add* any thing that dieth of \w itself|strong="H5038"\w*: thou shalt \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it unto the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* that \add is\add* in thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, that he may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it; or thou mayest \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* it unto an \w alien|strong="H5237"\w*: for thou \add art\add* an \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. Thou shalt not \w seethe|strong="H1310"\w* a \w kid|strong="H1423"\w* in his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w*.

Thou shalt \w truly|strong="H6237"\w* \w tithe|strong="H6237"\w* all the \w increase|strong="H8393"\w* of thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, that the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* bringeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* by \w year|strong="H8141"\w*.

And thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which he shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* to \w place|strong="H7931"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* there, the \w tithe|strong="H4643"\w* of thy \w corn|strong="H1715"\w*, of thy \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, and of thine \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, and the \w firstlings|strong="H1062"\w* of thy \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* and of thy \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*; that thou mayest \w learn|strong="H3925"\w* to \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w always|strong="H3117"\w*.

And if the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* be too \w long|strong="H7235"\w* for thee, so \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou art not \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* it; \add or\add* if the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* be too \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from thee, which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* to \w set|strong="H7760"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* there, when the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* thee:

Then shalt thou \w turn|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* into \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, and bind \w up|strong="H6696"\w* the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and shalt \w go|strong="H1980"\w* unto the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*:

And thou shalt \w bestow|strong="H5414"\w* that \w money|strong="H3701"\w* for whatsoever thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* lusteth \w after|strong="H0183"\w*, for \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, or for \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, or for \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, or for strong \w drink|strong="H7941"\w*, or for whatsoever thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w desireth|strong="H7592"\w*: and thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* there \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and thou shalt \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*, thou, and thine \w household|strong="H1004"\w*,\f + \fr 14.26 \ft desireth: Heb. asketh of thee\f*

And the \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* that \add is\add* within thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*; thou shalt not \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* him; for he hath no \w part|strong="H2506"\w* nor \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* with thee.

¶ At the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* thou shalt bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* all the \w tithe|strong="H4643"\w* of thine \w increase|strong="H8393"\w* the same \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, and shalt lay \add it\add* \w up|strong="H3240"\w* within thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*:

And the \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w*, (because he hath no \w part|strong="H2506"\w* nor \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* with thee,) and the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, and the \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, and the \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, which \add are\add* within thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*; that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* may \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee in all the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* which thou \w doest|strong="H6213"\w*.
